item.title: How I Made This Web Site
item.description: Written with markdown, generated by hugo, styled by bootstrap and hosted by github! You can’t beat this. Plain Text and Markdown My primary goal with a website framework was the ability to edit content with my favorite text editor emacs! Markdown, happens to be a very light weight, yet powerfull formatting tool that also reads well with plain text. Hugo Generates HTML5 Hugo is a static wesite generator that converts the content I write in markdown to the beautiful web pages you are reading now.
